name: muteRemoteAudioStream
description:
Stops or resumes subscribing to the audio stream of a specified user.Call this method after joining a channel.
  See recommended settings in Set the Subscribing State.

parameters.userId: The user ID of the specified user.

parameters.mute:
Whether to stop subscribing to the audio stream of the specified user.
      
 true: Stop subscribing to the audio stream of the specified user by default.
 false: (Default) Subscribe to the audio stream of the specified user by default.
